<implements name="BaseUnivariateSolver" />
* Interface for (univariate real) rootfinding algorithms. * Implementations will search for only one zero in the given interval. $Id: DifferentiableUnivariateSolver.java 1377245 2012-08-25 10:06:00Z luc $ as of 3.1, replaced by {@link UnivariateDifferentiableSolver}
